title: Dark Mode
description: Dark mode for the ENS manager.

title: Development Pipeline Improvements
description: Changes to the testing pipeline that allow feature releases to be expedited.

title: Gasless DNS Names
description: A gas-free method for using DNS names in ENS, utilising CCIP-Read.

title: ENSjs Refactor
description: A new slimmed down re-write of the JavaScript ENS library.

title: EVM Gateway
description: A generic CCIP-Read gateway for fetching state proofs of data on other EVM chains.

title: Normalisation Integration
description: Integration of the [new normalisation standard](https://docs.ens.domains/ens-improvement-proposals/ensip-15-normalization-standard) into the ENS manager.

title: Manager App V3
description: The next generation manager for ENS, read more [here](https://mirror.xyz/taytems.eth/0EDU9u4zItawHZdoQmJN0evj7UZLAdYepR1Yz2oADP8).

title: NameWrapper
description: Allows ENS names to become ERC1155 tokens, enabling better controls and consistency for users.

title: CCIP Read
description: The next wave of scalability within the ENS ecosystem, which allows users to create full ENS profiles for free offchain.
